::Demise::

Demise nods, reaching Killfest's door. He opens it and motions for 
Darkmouse to enter.

"Hmm. Every bot has weaknesses, the trick is to know what they are."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse:;
> 
> "He's good. Very good. He killed another bot in one blow earlier. 
> He's strong, but he has a weakness, I'm just not sure what it is."
